name: productboard
description: Integrate the Productboard API into agentic workflows via MCP.

PRODUCTBOARD_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: An access token needed to authenticate with the Productboard API. This token is required to make requests to the API and must be kept confidential.

tools.name: get_products
tools.description: Returns detail of all products. This API is paginated and the page limit is always 100

tools.name: get_product_detail
tools.description: Returns detailed information about a specific product

productId.description: ID of the product to retrieve

tools.name: get_features
tools.description: Returns a list of all features. This API is paginated and the page limit is always 100

tools.name: get_feature_detail
tools.description: Returns detailed information about a specific feature

featureId.description: ID of the feature to retrieve

tools.name: get_components
tools.description: Returns a list of all components. This API is paginated and the page limit is always 100

tools.name: get_component_detail
tools.description: Returns detailed information about a specific component

componentId.description: ID of the component to retrieve

tools.name: get_feature_statuses
tools.description: Returns a list of all feature statuses. This API is paginated and the page limit is always 100

tools.name: get_notes
tools.description: Returns a list of all notes

last.description: Return only notes created since given span of months (m), days (s), or hours (h). E.g. 6m | 10d | 24h | 1h. Cannot be combined with createdFrom, createdTo, dateFrom, or dateTo

createdFrom.description: Return only notes created since given date. Cannot be combined with last

createdTo.description: Return only notes created before or equal to the given date. Cannot be combined with last

updatedFrom.description: Return only notes updated since given date

updatedTo.description: Return only notes updated before or equal to the given date

term.description: Return only notes by fulltext search

featureId.description: Return only notes for specific feature ID or its descendants

companyId.description: Return only notes for specific company ID

ownerEmail.description: Return only notes owned by a specific owner email

source.description: Return only notes from a specific source origin. This is the unique string identifying the external system from which the data came

anyTag.description: Return only notes that have been assigned any of the tags in the array. Cannot be combined with allTags

allTags.description: Return only notes that have been assigned all of the tags in the array. Cannot be combined with anyTag

pageCursor.description: Page cursor to get next page of results

tools.name: get_note_detail
tools.description: Returns detailed information about a specific note

noteId.description: ID of the note to retrieve

tools.name: get_companies
tools.description: Returns a list of all companies. This API is paginated and the page limit is always 100

tools.name: get_company_detail
tools.description: Returns detailed information about a specific company

companyId.description: ID of the company to retrieve
